lore: As is the case with Angels, the only way to stop an Unguided from killing indiscriminately is for a Mage to establish a bond with it, though one still needs to be careful with it afterwards.\n\nKilling is not enough for the Unguided Sadist, nor is any other punishment that does not involve physical pain. These creatures were the first in history to employ torture creatively. Erebyss and Surathli were upset as they watched humans follow their example, to which Gonfurian had to say, "Don't worry, you have only hastened the inevitable".
menagerieDialog: (You can't help but admire the brilliance of its appearance.)
(It watches you carefully, obediently waiting for your next command.)
(This creature emanates an aura of pure evil. You're fortunate to have such strong control over it, lest it could wreak havoc on your kingdom.)
I will make my own decisions in battle. You need only sit back and enjoy the show.
(This creature has an annoying habit of breaking its chair when it's unhappy. Perhaps a few days of standing will help it change its ways.)
name: Unguided Sadist
